info.brief_description: A family that's been swapped lives their lives and tries to return to normal.
info.description:
You are Jimmy, a mature fourteen year old boy. But that's because for the past six years you've been living as your mother. And your sister, a young thirteen year old has been living as your father. Both of your parents are stuck in your original bodies, growing slowly but surely. Thankfully, your wealthy grandmother (on your father's side) was able to take care of you all while your father tried to slowly learn what he could about his father's body swap machine that did this to you all.

This is the story of how you and your family try to live normal lives as you go out and do routine tasks. It's also about how your family tries to fix things, and may end up screwing everything up even more.

Just as a note: Please no explicit sex. Sex can happen, but nothing explicit please.
